column5: Does anyone know how to find out when the walleye opener is for Northern Ontario 2005?
[font color=green size=3][b]Historically the walleye opener in NWO falls on the 3rd Saturday in May.
Trailer guy is corrent. It will be a very late opener next year. I believe is it May 20 or 21. If I'm not mistaken, May 1 is a Sunday so that pushed the third Saturday til quite late in the month.
